cdse-s3.title: Copernicus Data Space Ecosystem S3
cdse-s3.description: This endpoint provides access to EO data which is stored on the object storage of both CloudFerro Cloud and OpenTelekom Cloud (OTC). See the [documentation](https://documentation.dataspace.copernicus.eu/APIs/S3.html) for more information, including how to get credentials.

creodias-s3.title: CREODIAS S3
creodias-s3.description: Comprehensive Earth Observation Data (EODATA) archive offered by CREODIAS as a commercial part of CDSE, designed to provide users with access to a vast repository of satellite data without predefined quota limits.

delta_time.description: offset from reference start time of measurement

time_utc.description: Time of observation as ISO 8601 date-time string

cloud_top_pressure_precision.description: cloud optical centroid top pressure precision

cloud_base_pressure.description: cloud base pressure assumed in ROCINN retrieval

cloud_base_pressure_precision.description: cloud base pressure precision assumed in ROCINN retrieval

cloud_base_height.description: cloud base height assumed in ROCINN retrieval

cloud_base_height_precision.description: cloud base height precision assumed in ROCINN retrieval

cloud_optical_thickness_precision.description: cloud optical thickness precision coregistered using the OCRA/ROCINN CAL model.

northward_wind.description: Northward wind from ECMWF at 10 meter height level

eastward_wind.description: Eastward wind from ECMWF at 10 meter height level

viirs_cloud_fraction.description: Ratio of VIIRS pixels classified as CONFIDENTLY_CLOUDY in the UV/VIS

viirs_cloud_fraction_nir.description: Ratio of VIIRS pixels classified as CONFIDENTLY_CLOUDY in the near infrared

cloud_fraction_crb.description: effective radiometric cloud fraction from the CRB model

cloud_fraction_crb_precision.description: effective radiometric cloud fraction precision from the CRB model

cloud_pressure_crb.description: cloud radiometric optical centroid pressure from the CRB model

cloud_pressure_crb_precision.description: cloud radiometric optical centroid pressure precision from the CRB model

cloud_height_crb.description: cloud radiometric optical centroid height from the CRB model

cloud_height_crb_precision.description: cloud radiometric optical centroid height precision from the CRB model

cloud_albedo_crb.description: cloud albedo from the CRB model

cloud_albedo_crb_precision.description: cloud albedo precision from the CRB model

surface_albedo_fitted_crb.description: surface albedo fitted from the CRB model

surface_albedo_fitted_crb_precision.description: surface albedo fitted precision from the CRB model

cloud_fraction_apriori.description: effective radiometric cloud fraction a priori

number_of_iterations.description: number of rocinn iterations reached per pixel for the CAL model

number_of_iterations_crb.description: number of rocinn iterations reached per pixel for the CRB model

fitted_root_mean_square_crb.description: root mean square residual from the CRB model

degrees_of_freedom.description: final degrees of freedom of the rocinn inversion using the CAL model

degrees_of_freedom_crb.description: final degrees of freedom of the rocinn inversion using the CRB model

number_of_spectral_points_in_retrieval.description: Number of spectral points used in the CAL retrieval

effective_scene_height.description: effective scene height from the CRB model

effective_scene_height_precision.description: effective scene height precision from the CRB model

effective_scene_pressure.description: effective scene optical centroid pressure from the CRB model

effective_scene_pressure_precision.description: effective scene pressure precision from the CRB model

cloud_fraction_apriori_nir.description: effective radiometric cloud fraction a priori

regularization_parameter_nir.description: regularization parameter of the rocinn inversion using the CAL model

condition_number_nir.description: final condition number of the rocinn inversion using the CAL model

degrees_of_freedom_nir.description: final degrees of freedom of the rocinn inversion using the CAL model

shannon_information_content_nir.description: final shannon information content of the rocinn inversion using the CAL model

number_of_iterations_nir.description: number of rocinn iterations reached per pixel for the CAL model

convergence_flag_nir.description: flag signaling the convergence of the cal algorithm

fitted_state_vector_nir.description: fitted parameters in CAL ROCINN retrieval

covariance_matrix_diagonal_nir.description: The diagonal entries of the covariance matrix of the CAL ROCINN retrieval

cloud_height_crb_nir.description: cloud radiometric optical centroid height from the CRB model

surface_albedo_fitted_crb_nir.description: surface albedo fitted from the CRB model

cloud_height_crb_precision_nir.description: cloud radiometric optical centroid height precision from the CRB model

cloud_albedo_crb_precision_nir.description: cloud albedo precision from the CRB model

cloud_fraction_crb_precision_nir.description: effective radiometric cloud fraction precision from the CRB model

surface_albedo_fitted_crb_precision_nir.description: surface albedo fitted precision from the CRB model

regularization_parameter_crb_nir.description: regularization parameter of the rocinn inversion using the CRB model

condition_number_crb_nir.description: final condition number of the rocinn inversion using the CRB model

fitted_state_vector_crb_nir.description: fitted parameters in CRB ROCINN retrieval

covariance_matrix_diagonal_crb_nir.description: The diagonal entries of the covariance matrix of the CRB ROCINN retrieval

effective_scene_albedo_nir.description: effective scene albedo from the CRB model

effective_scene_albedo_precision_nir.description: effective scene albedo precision from the CRB model

degrees_of_freedom_ge_nir.description: final degrees of freedom of the rocinn inversion using the CRB model for the effective scene

shannon_information_content_ge_nir.description: final shannon information content of the rocinn inversion using the CRB model for the effective scene

number_of_iterations_ge_nir.description: number of rocinn iterations reached per pixel for the CRB model for the effective scene

fitted_root_mean_square_ge_nir.description: root mean square residual from the CRB model for the effective scene

coregistration_flag_cloud_fraction_aprio.description: coregistration flag for the cloud_fraction_nir variable

coregistration_flag_cloud_fraction.description: coregistration flag for the cloud_fraction variable

coregistration_flag_cloud_top_height.description: coregistration flag for the cloud_top_height variable

calibration_polynomial_coefficients.description: computed coefficients of the polynomial function

calibration_subwindows_shift.description: irradiance wavelengths shift fitted values per subwindow

calibration_subwindows_squeeze.description: irradiance wavelengths squeeze fitted values per subwindow

calibration_subwindows_wavelength.description: calibration wavelength center in each subwindow

cloud_histogram.description: Histogram of cloud data in the current granule

cloud_pdf.description: Probability density function of cloud data in the current granule

links.title: Product history record from the CDSE traceability service
